attributes.action: recuse himself and each member of the Cabinet who is a Scottish constituency MP from any involvement in financial or political management of the NHS in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister and the majority of the members of his cabinet are scottish constituency MPs who were voted for by people who are now outside the jurisdiction of the people they voted for when it comes to matters of the National Health Service.  It cannot be politically nor morally right that politicians who have no right or authority over medical services in their own previous constituencies in Scotland can be permitted to make decisions over the provision of medical services in England, where there is not one single person who lodged even a single vote in favour of the people who are now in direct and punitive control of the provision of their medical services.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
